game.name: The Stickman
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Stickman is a movement-based FPS where you're a stick figure! Explore a plethora of customization options and have a whacky time with friends in PvE or PvP! Solo-Developed by a modder with way too much time on their hands
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Stickman is a movement-based FPS where you're a stick figure! Explore a plethora of customization options and have a whacky time with friends in PvE or PvP! Solo-Developed by a modder with way too much time on their hands
